Description:
Tidy Family Abode on Spacious 840sqm (approx.) Block
This much-loved family home is ready for new memories to be made that will last a lifetime for families of all sizes! Situated on an incredibly generous block of 840sqm (approx.) is this impeccably well-kept 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 living area abode.
Features throughout the home include:
Master bedroom complete with ensuite & walk-in robe.
Remaining bedrooms with built-in robes.
Gas central heating.
Split-system heating/cooling.
Tiles throughout.
Carpets in bedrooms & 1st living area.
4 gas burner cooktop & electric oven.
Study.
Downlights.
Ceiling fans in bedrooms & study.
Undercover alfresco area as you step out into the backyard.
Gas hot water system.
Double lock up garage & workshop.
Double carport.
16 solar panels.
Conveniently located within close proximity to a plethora of amenities to satisfy every member of the family such as the Geelong Ring Road (2-minute drive), Bell Post Hill Shopping Centre (2-minute drive), Waterworld Leisure Centre (3-minute drive), Corio Village (4-minute drive), multiple schools including Kardinia International College & Northern Bay College (within a 5-minute drive).
Insights: 6 Wattle Place, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
The ultimate family living.
Beyond the beautifully manicured front yard you'll be instantly enchanted by this spectacular family home on a comfortable allotment of 547m2 (approx.). Flaunting a completely stunning interior, a choice of two living areas and an incredible indoor-outdoor lifestyle. Effortlessly balancing old with new and cleverly designed to capture natural light and stunning features from just about every angle, this family entertainer is sure to impress. Upon entry an open plan, generously proportioned living and dining zone flows effortlessly through to the well-equipped gourmet kitchen with dishwasher and ample bench space. An undercover entertaining area is a further highlight for those summer nights with family and friends. Comprising of 5 comfortable bedrooms (master with ensuite and WIR), central bathroom and an additional bungalow out the back with a self-contained bathroom. This spectacular home also delivers a separate laundry, powder room, ducted heating, two car garage, solar panels and all in a location second to none. Surrounded by vibrant lifestyle amenities, local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and Princes Highway for commuters. Don't miss the chance to secure this remarkable property today!
Insights: 15 Kingsley Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Set in stunning manicured gardens.
This magnificent yet spacious entertainer, in a quiet and convenient location, sets the standard in quality and lifestyle living. Superbly presented throughout and set on an amazing 1,263m2 (approx.). This is a home showcasing light, bright open spaces with three generous bedrooms (including BIRs), large open plan living and dining rooms, central kitchen and meals with plenty of cupboard space, stunning central bathroom and ensuite in master bedroom, separate toilet and laundry. Out the back you will find your dream lifestyle with a manicured rear yard with an undercover entertaining area, workshop/storage room and two car garage with single car carport. Extras in the home include gas heating, gas stove, ceiling fans throughout and a gazebo. This quality home should not be missed.
Insights: 19-21 Merlin Crescent, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Free flowing floorplan.
Showcasing single level ease and contemporary flair with this appealing 3 bedroom and single bathroom home. Kitchen/meals/living area is complimented by an abundance of space with views overlooking the rear yard. The home is further enhanced by a generous front formal living area and gas heating & split system cooling for all year comfort. Only a 15 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and within close proximity to local train stations, parks and schools. This immaculate home is ideal for couples, young families, investors and downsizers. Be sure to book your inspection today.

Description:
Break Into The Market
** Call or email to register for a private inspection **
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac, this family abode is a terrific opportunity to enter the market. Investors will be drawn to the central location close to Corio Village, schools, public transport and the Geelong Ring Road while renovators will love the potential to modernise and add value. There's a large living room with split system air-conditioning, a dining room with a gas log heater and ducted heating throughout for absolute comfort. A spacious galley-style kitchen with a breakfast bar and gas cooktop awaits the home chef. All three bedrooms have easy access to the central bathroom with a separate bath, shower and toilet while the master also offers split system air-conditioning and a built-in robe. Completing this well-considered layout is an abundance of built-in storage and a separate laundry. The home is set on a generous block with room for the kids and family pet to play plus ample undercover parking for the car enthusiast and a 5.1 x 6.1metre garage and work shop. Don't miss this opportunity to get into the market.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 4 Chirnside Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
"Attention Investors"
Situated on a large 657m2 block (approx.) is this fully renovated 4 bedroom family home. Boasting a large open living area & renovated kitchen/dining area with stainless steel appliances and 2 new bathrooms with quality fixtures and fittings. Single lock up garage and all located within 5 minutes from major Corio Central shopping centre, 2 minutes from the Geelong Homemaker Centre, 45 minutes from Melbourne CBD & 15 minutes from Geelong CBD. What more could you want? Large home on a large block right in the middle of Melb CBD and the Surf Coast!
Currently tenanted at $340 per week, makes this the perfect addition to your investment portfolio or first home.

-Quality Fixtures & Fittings

Description:
Bursting with potential.
Calling all investors, developers and first home buyers. You will immediately appreciate the location & size of this bright and appealing property representing outstanding value for any purchaser. Comprising of a lounge complete with gas heater, air conditioner and floorboards that continue through to the 2 generous sized bedrooms both featuring BIRs. The kitchen area provides gas cooking and room for a meals area with views overlooking the rear yard. Situated on an extensive 696m2 approx. parcel of land the backyard provides an abundance of space, a blank canvas perfect for the new owner of this charming property to utilise as they see fit and potentially sub-divide (STCA). Ideal location just minutes to the Corio train station with public transport just down the road and Corio Shopping Centre not far away. Easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and Geelong's CBD just a 10 minute drive down Princes Highway. The home is within easy reach to all major amenities. Invest with the best and enquire now to secure this outstanding home today.
Insights: 239 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal location and neat as a pin!
This lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit with SLUG and undercover outdoor area has everything you would need and more. On a generous 291m2 it is ideally located close to Shops and public transport. With a large space for additional vehicles to the side of the unit it would suit those who want a "Lock up and leave" lifestyle. 1 of only 2 units on the block it shares a concrete drive with the rear unit. The layout has an open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The kitchen is a great size and features a gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. Down the hall are the 2 bedrooms with BIR, central bathroom and laundry. Outside is an undercover area with court yard with access to the garage. This provides the occupant with security to access the garage. In addition the windows facing the street all have electronic security shutters fitted. Climate control is via split system air-conditioning and central gas heating. This really is a fantastic package and represents a great opportunity to buy an immaculate unit in a great location. You'll need to be quick to inspect!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 1/26 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom unit in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Please Contact Us to Book a Private Inspection
Located in the established Cloverdale Estate is this delightful 3 bedroom family home. The clever floorplan is perfect for entertaining with a lounge, dining, plus open plan living with timber flooring. Other features include central heating, air conditioner, built in timber display, timber kitchen with gas cooktop and dishwasher, paved undercover outdoor area, established garden plus double garage with auto door. Set in a quiet court and handy to local playground, shops and ring road makes this home an ideal investment. Currently tenanted for 12 months.

Description:
Attention Investors and First Home Buyers
Conveniently located in a quiet street this well presented 3 bedroom home on a 583m2 approx. block is ready & waiting. With floorboards upon entry which flow through the home boasting 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIRs and light filled living area with split system heating/cooling. The updated kitchen provides plenty of bench and cupboard space and an adjoining dining area. The central bathroom services the home while the separate laundry has rear yard access. The secure rear yard with bungalow, single lock up garage and a low maintenance grassed yard. The location is ideal, just a short commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway. This home really does have it all! Currently tenanted, be sure to enquire today before it's too late.

Description:
Low maintenance living.
Set in beautifully manicured gardens this stunning three bedroom property delivers a lifestyle of easy-living thanks to it's surprisingly spacious floorplan, an impressive list of features and delightful outdoor entertaining area, perfect for those summer nights with friends. An oasis of light and space, the home's inviting interior comprises a large master bedroom with walk in robe and private ensuite, two additional bedrooms (also with BIRs), main central bathroom and separate powder room (second WC). Wonderfully versatile, the open-plan kitchen/dining area is further enhanced by a well-appointed kitchen, complete with dishwasher and gas cooking, which flows through to the living area. Floorboards throughout, the home also includes ducted heating and split system cooling for year-round comfort, single car garage, garden shed & large grassed rear yard. Step outside to discover a serene back garden with plenty of space the kids can enjoy. Within close proximity to all major amenities such as Corio Village Shopping Centre, medical clinics, public transport & the Princes Highway for those who make the commute to Melbourne. Ideally situated this is a property you won't want to miss! Call Chari to inspect today.
Insights: 20A Hendy Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal Development/Investment Opportunity!
Situated on a corner block of 594m2 (approx), less than 1km from Corio Central major shopping centre, public transport, doctors, primary schools and child care, this is an ideal property for the astute investor!
The solid home comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with built-in robes, functional kitchen with good cupboard & bench space, gas hot plates and electric oven. The meals and living area offers floorboards, air conditioner and gas heater.
Outside there is a double garage with bathroom and sauna at the rear. The property is currently tenanted at $260 per week until May 2020.
Collect an income while you make plans on further development (STCA). This is an opportunity not to be missed!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Just Unpack and Enjoy"
** Call, email or text to register for a private inspection **
This beautifully renovated home offers buyers the ability to move in and simply enjoy.
Whether you are looking for a home to live in or invest in then an inspection is a must as the lifestyle this property offers is a 10/10.
Tastefully renovated with 3 bedrooms with built-in robes, open plan kitchen /meals with living area and a separate lounge offers plenty of space for families.
And.. if you love entertaining then the Outdoor Living / Entertainment area with a decked pergola and Man Cave/Workshop will be sure to impress.
With secure parking behind the roller door, landscaped gardens, solar panels and water tank then all situated within walking distance to public transport, shops and parks makes this a perfect choice for owner-occupiers or investors.
- 3 bedrooms with built-in robes
- Totally Renovated
- Solar Panels & Water Tank
- Landscaped Gardens
- Outdoor Entertainment Areas
- Workshop/Man Cave

Description:
An outstanding family home.
Presenting a brilliant family home with features that will win your heart the moment you step inside. Perfect for the first home buyer, growing family or investors alike. The home offers an abundance of natural light, space and a free flowing floorplan that the whole family will love. Comprising of four spacious bedrooms (master with BIR), central bathroom with a separate powder room, an inviting kitchen that includes quality appliances and a dishwasher which overlooks the open plan living and dining area. A spacious outdoor entertainment area is a delight with its well-maintained 612m2 (approx.) backyard and plenty of off street parking.
Within close proximity to local schools, the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and very easy access to the Melbourne freeway. An inspection is a must. Call today.
Insights: 3 Cudgee Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime opportunity for redevelopment
Positioned in the heart of the high density growth zone, this property is primed for redevelopment. With scope to retain the existing dwelling and build one or possibly two townhouses (STCA) in the backyard, renovate, rent as is or move in, this flexible property is sure to appeal to the savvy buyer. Currently, the home offers two good-size bedrooms, serviced by the central bathroom. The north facing lounge ensures year round comfort with split system air-conditioning and gas heating while the kitchen and meals area is generous and look out over the spacious backyard. You can leave the car at home in the single detached garage and walk to the bustling Corio Village shopping centre and a host of public transport links. For families, primary and secondary schools and parks are also within walking distance while the Geelong Ring Road is easily accessible.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 25 Canadian Parade, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling all investors.
Calling all investors, an opportunity that will attract long-term tenants is what you can expect from this spacious brick home in a quiet area of Corio. This 3 bedroom home has been well looked after and will certainly cater for a family that desires room to move in a handy location close to schools, transport and a major shopping centre. With gas heating, the property has a simple yet comfortable design featuring a bright formal lounge room and a separate dining area. The functional kitchen has gas cooking and is well equipped for preparing meals with ample bench space. The hallway leads to the sunny back porch and covered verandah, overlooking the securely fenced yard that is suitable for young children to play or pets to roam. A generous laundry and central bathroom are located near the three good-sized bedrooms, all of which have built-in robes for convenient storage and one with a built-in desk. This solid home sits on a 613sqm allotment with a double brick garage and veggie patch for the enthusiastic green thumb. The extensive driveway along the side of the home provides additional off street parking.
Insights: 69 Hendy Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Solid Family Home or Investment on Spacious 765sqm Block (approx.)
Investors & growing families take note! This incredibly tidy 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom abode is nestled away in a quiet court on a spacious block size of 765sqm (approx.).
Features throughout the home include:
Evaporative cooling.
Gas central heating.
Ceiling fans in all bedrooms.
Split-system heating/cooling in upstairs bedroom.
Master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in robe.
Study nook upstairs.
Built-in robes in 2 of the downstairs bedrooms.
Floating floorboards throughout.
Carpets in bedrooms.
Tiled floor in bathroom.
Decked alfresco area as you step outside the back door.
Downlights in the kitchen & the decked entertainment area.
Large fully lined studio (8.9m x 5.9m) with downlights & ceiling fan.
Single lock up garage next to the studio.
Storage shed at the rear of the property (3.4m x 3.4m).
2x water tanks.
Wonderfully located within close proximity of many amenities such as being a 30sec stroll to Northern Bay College, a short 2-minute drive to the Corio Village for all of your shopping needs, within a 3-minute drive from numerous reserves & the Corio Football Club & just a 4-minute drive to the Geelong Ring Road making travel to Melbourne & the Surf Coast simple.
Rental return of approximately $430 per week.
Insights: 5 Kerry Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
